short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily copy special characters to your clipboard with this Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension provides users with an organized list of special characters from various categories, including symbols, punctuations, and language-specific characters. With a single click, you can copy any character to your clipboard. Additionally, the extension keeps track of your most recently used characters for quick access.
